name: math-grpc-node
description: A simple math GRPC microservice, for the purpose of learning and evaluating Node and gRPC.

scripts.build-pkg-linux-arm64: # mkdir -p ~/.pkg-cache/v2.6/ && wget https://github.com/robertsLando/pkg-binaries/blob/master/arm64/fetched-v12.2.0-linux-arm64?raw=true -O ~/.pkg-cache/v2.6/fetched-v12.2.0-linux-arm64 && mkdir -p .bin && pkg ./src/cmd/server/math -t linux-arm64 -o .bin/math-grpc-node-server-linux-arm64 && cp node_modules/grpc/src/node/extension_binary/*/grpc_node.node .bin/grpc_node.node-linux-arm64

author: Felicitas Pojtinger <felicitas@pojtinger.com>
